Public Interface IArrayContract(Of C) Implements IEnumerableContract(Of C)
generic <typename C> where C : IContractpublic interface class IArrayContract : System::AddIn::Contract::Collections::IEnumerableContract<C>
type IArrayContract<'C (requires 'C :> IContract)> = interface interface IEnumerableContract<'C (requires 'C :> IContract)> interface IContract

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements in the array. C must implement the interface.
Docs.summary: Represents a generic array of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> to pass an array of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> objects between contracts by reference.
An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> does not dynamically resize itself.
